name: Where the Storm Ends
description:
A storm is coming. A big storm. Two life long friends must escape before their town is completely underwater. Play and witness them reliving their old childhood memories while trying to avoid the doom lurking behind them.

This game was made in 3 days out of pure boredom that I like to call "social distancing". It's very short (about 10 minutes if you take your time). Thanks for playing! (Also please try not to spoil the endings in the comments haha)
